description.step1: Cook the Slow-Cooker Vegetable Soup overnight on Day 1 so it's ready for lunch on Day 2. Portion out two 1 1/2-cup servings into leak-proof containers to have later in the week for lunch on Days 3 and 5. Freeze an additional two 1 1/2-cup servings to have for lunch in Week 3. Freeze any remaining soup in an air-tight container for up to 6 months.
description.step2: Prepare the Blueberry-Banana Overnight Oats so it's ready to grab-and-go in the morning of Day 2. Store in glass leak-proof containers that can go from the fridge to the microwave.

fields.lunch: 1 serving Butternut Squash Soup with Avocado & Chickpeas (402 calories)
fields.dinner: 1 serving Citrus Poached Salmon with Asparagus with 3/4 cup Cauliflower Rice (451 calories)
